index-content.head_title: Document Redaction Solution. Edit or remove any sensitive data.
index-content.head_description: Remove, redact, or hide text, images, or metadata in PDFs, Word documents, Excel spreadsheets, PowerPoint presentations, images, and more. Use our library in your .NET, Java, Python, or cloud-based applications.
index-content.title: Document Redaction Library
index-content.description_0: Hide or remove private information from various file types.
index-content.description_1: Edit text or images to eliminate sensitive content.
index-content.description_2: Manage file metadata using our advanced features.

features.title: {{ProdShortName}} at a Glance
features.description: A solution to manage content in PDFs, Office documents, images, and other business files.

feature_1.title: Remove or Edit Text
feature_1.content: Find and redact sensitive text in your documents with ease.

feature_2.title: Redact Images
feature_2.content: Easily hide image areas in your files without extra effort.

feature_3.title: Manage Metadata
feature_3.content: Remove or replace metadata such as the author in Word documents or EXIF data in images.

feature_4.title: Advanced Features
feature_4.content: Search for data to redact using regular expressions or AI integration.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.description: Answers to the most commonly asked questions.

item_1.question: Does the {{ProdShortName}} library require any third-party software to manipulate documents?
item_1.answer: {{ProdShortName}} does not require any external software like Adobe Acrobat, Microsoft Office, or others.

item_2.question: Can I try the {{ProdShortName}} library before purchasing?
item_2.answer: Yes, you can try {{ProdShortName}} without purchasing a license. It works in trial mode, which adds trial badges and limits output to the first 3 pages. To test without restrictions, request a 30-day temporary license. For more details, [see]({{LicensingUrl}}).

item_3.question: What license options are available?
item_3.answer: We offer several license types based on your development and distribution needs. These include developer-based, site-based, and Metered licenses depending on usage. Learn more [here]({{PricingUrl}}).

cloud_links.title: {{ProdShortName}} Low-Code APIs
cloud_links.description: Integrate document redaction into any application using our cloud-based REST API.

item_1.content: Use cURL commands with our RESTful Cloud API to redact documents in a wide range of supported file formats.

item_2.content: Extract images, text, and metadata or redact documents using templates in Microsoft .NET applications.

item_3.content: Java SDK for redacting documents and extracting data within your Java-based applications.

app_links.title: {{ProdShortName}} No-Code Apps
app_links.description: A web-based app that enables you to redact over 30 popular file formats directly in your browser.

item_1.content: Free online tool to redact Word, Excel, PowerPoint, PDF, and 30+ other file types.

item_2.content: Redact Word documents in your browser and extract images, text, or metadata.

item_3.content: Free PDF redaction tool that works on any device or platform with no limitations.

index-content-net.head_title: Redact sensitive data in your documents using {{EnvNameShort}}
index-content-net.head_description: Safeguard your business documents with {{ProdFullName}}. Easily redact, hide, or remove confidential content from PDFs, Word, Excel, PowerPoint, and image files.
index-content-net.title: Secure Your Content with {{ProdShortName}}
index-content-net.description: Redact, hide, or permanently remove sensitive information and metadata from PDFs, Word documents, spreadsheets, presentations, and images using our powerful {{EnvNameShort}} solution.
index-content-net.code_comment_1: Pass the input file to a {{textRedactor}} instance
index-content-net.overview_description: Add professional-grade content redaction to your {{EnvNameShort}} applications

overview_feature_1.title: Redact Textual Content
overview_feature_1.description: {{ProdFullName}} allows you to locate and redact sensitive text. Text can be replaced or hidden using colored image overlays for added security. Supported across a wide variety of formats including PDFs and Office documents, this feature helps protect private data and streamline business compliance.

overview_feature_2.title: Redact Images
overview_feature_2.description: Automatically detect and redact images—either fully or partially—on document pages. Specify search criteria and targeted regions to mask sensitive visual content efficiently.

overview_feature_3.title: Manage File Metadata
overview_feature_3.description: Many file types contain hidden metadata, such as author names in Word files or EXIF data in images. {{ProdFullName}} makes it simple to find and redact this information to ensure full data privacy.

overview_feature_4.title: Redact Document Objects
overview_feature_4.description: Ensure complete content protection by redacting document-specific elements like annotations, comments, and embedded objects in formats such as PDFs.

features.title: {{ProdFullName}} Features
features.description: Extract and redact data from PDFs, Office files, and images with high speed and accuracy.

feature_1.title: Flexible Search
feature_1.content: Perform case-sensitive or case-insensitive searches to redact specific phrases or terms.

feature_2.title: Replace or Remove Text
feature_2.content: Easily find and replace or delete sensitive text throughout your documents.

feature_3.title: Hide Text with Images
feature_3.content: Use colored image overlays to visually mask redacted content instead of replacing text.

feature_4.title: Advanced Search Capabilities
feature_4.content: Use regular expressions for precise and flexible content redaction across complex data sets.

feature_5.title: Scoped Redaction
feature_5.content: Target specific pages or defined page areas to limit redaction to relevant sections only.

feature_6.title: Metadata Redaction
feature_6.content: Find and redact metadata properties to protect document ownership and creation details.

feature_7.title: Flexible Output Formats
feature_7.content: Export redacted files to PDF or any supported format while preserving layout integrity.

feature_8.title: Complete Metadata Erasure
feature_8.content: Erase all metadata from a document in a single action to ensure absolute privacy.

feature_9.title: XML-Based Redaction Rules
feature_9.content: Define redaction policies in XML format for repeatable, automated processing across multiple files.

index-content-java.overview_description: Enhance your {{EnvNameShort}} applications with professional redaction tools

overview_feature_1.title: Remove Sensitive Text
overview_feature_1.description: With {{ProdFullName}}, you can search for and conceal private text using customizable overlays or replacements. Compatible with PDFs, Word, Excel, and more, it's ideal for regulatory compliance and secure document sharing.

overview_feature_2.title: Conceal Images
overview_feature_2.description: Identify and mask images completely or partially based on your requirements. Define detection rules and area coordinates to secure visual data efficiently.

overview_feature_3.title: Clean Embedded Metadata
overview_feature_3.description: Files may carry hidden information such as author names, creation tools, or device details. {{ProdFullName}} lets you detect and sanitize metadata in Word, Excel, images, and other formats.

overview_feature_4.title: Redact Embedded Objects
overview_feature_4.description: Thoroughly sanitize documents by redacting objects like PDF annotations, comments, or other embedded items to eliminate any trace of confidential information.

features.title: What You Can Do with {{ProdShortName}}
features.description: Quickly locate and redact content from PDFs, Office documents, and images with precision.

feature_1.title: Search with Precision
feature_1.content: Use case-sensitive and case-insensitive search modes to find and redact exact matches.

feature_2.title: Find and Replace Text
feature_2.content: Automatically detect and substitute or delete confidential text across the document.

feature_3.title: Overlay with Custom Images
feature_3.content: Use image blocks to obscure redacted text, preserving layout while hiding details.

feature_4.title: Use Regex for Advanced Redaction
feature_4.content: Utilize regular expressions to detect complex patterns and redact intelligently.

feature_5.title: Redact Specific Areas
feature_5.content: Limit redaction to selected pages or zones by defining precise areas to target.

feature_6.title: Scrub Metadata Fields
feature_6.content: Identify and clean document metadata, including author, company, or tracking data.

feature_7.title: Export in Desired Format
feature_7.content: Save your redacted files in PDF or another supported format without losing layout integrity.

feature_8.title: Wipe All Metadata
feature_8.content: Completely remove metadata from supported files in just one command.

feature_9.title: Automated Redaction Policies
feature_9.content: Create reusable redaction configurations stored in XML for consistent, batch redaction.

index-content-python.head_title: Erase confidential information from documents with {{EnvNameShort}}
index-content-python.head_description: Keep your files secure using {{ProdFullName}}. Quickly redact, hide, or delete sensitive content in PDFs, Word, Excel, PowerPoint, and image files.
index-content-python.title: Keep Your Documents Safe with {{ProdShortName}}
index-content-python.description: Easily remove private data, redact text, and clean hidden metadata from PDFs, Office files, and images using the advanced {{EnvNameShort}} toolkit.
index-content-python.code_comment_1: Load your file into the {{textRedactor}} instance
index-content-python.overview_description: Integrate powerful redaction capabilities into your {{EnvNameShort}} projects

overview_feature_1.title: Redact Sensitive Text
overview_feature_1.description: With {{ProdFullName}}, you can automatically find and cover sensitive words or phrases. Replace or mask text with colored boxes for enhanced protection across PDFs, Word documents, and other formats.

overview_feature_2.title: Mask Images
overview_feature_2.description: Our technology can detect images and blur, hide, or block them based on your chosen criteria. Define specific regions or allow automated detection for complete control.

overview_feature_3.title: Remove Hidden Metadata
overview_feature_3.description: Eliminate personal or tracking details hidden in metadata, such as authorship or device info. {{ProdFullName}} ensures your documents are fully scrubbed and safe to share.

overview_feature_4.title: Redact Special Elements
overview_feature_4.description: Go beyond text by redacting embedded items like comments, annotations, and other file-specific elements to achieve total confidentiality.

features.title: Key Features of {{ProdFullName}}
features.description: Effortlessly scan, locate, and redact sensitive content in PDFs, images, and Office files.

feature_1.title: Customizable Search
feature_1.content: Use flexible search modes to find precise matches or keywords for removal.

feature_2.title: Find, Replace, or Delete Text
feature_2.content: Locate sensitive data and either substitute it with safe text or erase it completely.

feature_3.title: Visual Masking
feature_3.content: Overlay colored shapes or patterns to visually cover redacted sections.

feature_4.title: Regex-Powered Detection
feature_4.content: Leverage regular expressions for pinpoint accuracy in advanced text searches.

feature_5.title: Targeted Redaction
feature_5.content: Apply redaction only to certain pages or defined regions to save time and focus on key areas.

feature_6.title: Metadata Sanitization
feature_6.content: Easily clear metadata fields like creator, company, or timestamps from your files.

feature_7.title: Export Options
feature_7.content: Save processed documents in PDF or other compatible formats without losing layout fidelity.

feature_8.title: Complete Metadata Wipe
feature_8.content: Erase all embedded metadata with a single click for maximum data protection.

feature_9.title: Reusable XML Policies
feature_9.content: Save your custom redaction configurations as XML templates to automate future tasks.
